name.description: Name is the unique identifier for this agent.

dir.description: Dir is the working directory for the agent session.

suspended.description: Suspended prevents the reconciler from spawning this agent. Toggle with gc agent suspend/resume.

prompt_template.description: PromptTemplate is the path to this agent's prompt template file.

nudge.description:
Nudge is text typed into the agent's tmux session after startup.
Used for CLI agents that don't accept command-line prompts.

provider.description: Provider names the provider preset to use for this agent.

start_command.description: StartCommand overrides the provider's command for this agent.

args.description: Args overrides the provider's default arguments.

prompt_mode.description: PromptMode controls how prompts are delivered: "arg", "flag", or "none".

prompt_flag.description: PromptFlag is the CLI flag used to pass prompts when prompt_mode is "flag".

ready_delay_ms.description: ReadyDelayMs is milliseconds to wait after launch before considering the agent ready.

ready_prompt_prefix.description: ReadyPromptPrefix is the string prefix that indicates the agent is ready for input.

process_names.description: ProcessNames lists process names to look for when checking if the agent is running.

emits_permission_warning.description: EmitsPermissionWarning indicates whether the agent emits permission prompts that should be suppressed.

env.description: Env sets additional environment variables for the agent process.

pool.description: Pool configures elastic pool behavior. When set, the agent becomes a pool.

work_query.description:
WorkQuery is the command to find available work for this agent.
Used by gc hook and available in prompt templates as {{ .WorkQuery }}.
Default: "bd ready --assignee=<agent-qualified-name>"

idle_timeout.description:
IdleTimeout is the maximum time an agent session can be inactive before
the controller kills and restarts it. Empty (default) disables idle
checking. Example: "15m", "1h".

Agent.description: Agent defines a configured agent in the city.

agent.description: Agent is the name of the topology agent to override (required).

dir.description: Dir overrides the stamped dir (default: rig name).

suspended.description: Suspended sets the agent's suspended state.

env.description: Env adds or overrides environment variables.

env_remove.description: EnvRemove lists env var keys to remove.

prompt_template.description: PromptTemplate overrides the prompt template path.

idle_timeout.description: IdleTimeout overrides the idle timeout duration.

AgentOverride.description: AgentOverride modifies a topology-stamped agent for a specific rig.

dir.description: Dir is the targeting key (required with Name).

suspended.description: Suspended overrides the agent's suspended state.

env.description: Env adds or overrides environment variables.

env_remove.description: EnvRemove lists env var keys to remove after merging.

prompt_template.description: PromptTemplate overrides the prompt template path.

idle_timeout.description: IdleTimeout overrides the idle timeout duration.

AgentPatch.description: AgentPatch modifies an existing agent identified by (Dir, Name).

provider.description: Provider selects the bead store backend: "bd" (default) or "file".

include.description:
Include lists config fragment files to merge into this config.
Processed by LoadWithIncludes; not recursive (fragments cannot include).

workspace.description: Workspace holds city-level metadata (name, default provider).

providers.description: Providers defines named provider presets for agent startup.

agents.description: Agents lists all configured agents in this city.

rigs.description: Rigs lists external projects registered in the city.

patches.description: Patches holds targeted modifications applied after fragment merge.

beads.description: Beads configures the bead store backend.

dolt.description: Dolt configures optional dolt server connection overrides.

City.description: City is the top-level configuration for a Gas City instance.

patrol_interval.description: PatrolInterval is the health patrol interval as a Go duration string. Defaults to "30s".

max_restarts.description:
MaxRestarts is the maximum number of agent restarts within RestartWindow before
the agent is quarantined. 0 means unlimited (no crash loop detection). Defaults to 5.

restart_window.description:
RestartWindow is the sliding time window for counting restarts, as a Go duration
string. Defaults to "1h".

shutdown_timeout.description:
ShutdownTimeout is the time to wait after sending Ctrl-C before force-killing
agents during shutdown. Set to "0s" for immediate kill. Defaults to "5s".

port.description: Port is the dolt server port. Defaults to 3307.

host.description: Host is the dolt server hostname. Defaults to localhost.

DoltConfig.description: DoltConfig holds optional dolt server overrides.

dir.description: Dir is the path to the formulas directory. Defaults to ".gc/formulas".

Patches.description: Patches holds all patch blocks from composition.

min.description: Min is the minimum number of pool instances. Defaults to 0.

max.description: Max is the maximum number of pool instances. Defaults to 0.

check.description: Check is a shell command whose output determines desired pool size. Defaults to "echo 1".

drain_timeout.description: DrainTimeout is the maximum time to wait for a pool instance to drain. Defaults to "5m".

PoolConfig.description: PoolConfig defines elastic pool parameters for an agent.

check.description: Check overrides the pool check command.

env.description: Env adds or overrides environment variables.

env_remove.description: EnvRemove lists env var keys to remove.

_replace.description: Replace replaces the entire provider block instead of deep-merging.

ProviderPatch.description: ProviderPatch modifies an existing provider identified by Name.

display_name.description: DisplayName is the human-readable name shown in UI and logs.

command.description: Command is the executable to run for this provider.

args.description: Args are default command-line arguments passed to the provider.

prompt_mode.description: PromptMode controls how prompts are delivered: "arg", "flag", or "none".

prompt_flag.description: PromptFlag is the CLI flag used when prompt_mode is "flag" (e.g. "--prompt").

ready_delay_ms.description: ReadyDelayMs is milliseconds to wait after launch before the provider is considered ready.

ready_prompt_prefix.description: ReadyPromptPrefix is the string prefix that indicates the provider is ready for input.

process_names.description: ProcessNames lists process names to look for when checking if the provider is running.

emits_permission_warning.description: EmitsPermissionWarning indicates whether the provider emits permission prompts.

env.description: Env sets additional environment variables for the provider process.

ProviderSpec.description: ProviderSpec defines a named provider's startup parameters.

name.description: Name is the unique identifier for this rig.

path.description: Path is the absolute filesystem path to the rig's repository.

prefix.description: Prefix overrides the auto-derived bead ID prefix for this rig.

suspended.description: Suspended prevents the reconciler from spawning agents in this rig. Toggle with gc rig suspend/resume.

topology.description:
Topology is the path to a topology directory to stamp agents from.
Relative paths resolve against the declaring file's directory.

overrides.description: Overrides are per-agent patches applied after topology expansion.

Rig.description: Rig defines an external project registered in the city.

path.description: Path overrides the rig's filesystem path.

prefix.description: Prefix overrides the bead ID prefix.

suspended.description: Suspended overrides the rig's suspended state.

RigPatch.description: RigPatch modifies an existing rig identified by Name.

name.description: Name is the human-readable name for this city.

provider.description: Provider is the default provider name used by agents that don't specify one.

start_command.description: StartCommand overrides the provider's command for all agents.

session_template.description:
SessionTemplate is a Go text/template string for session naming.
Available variables: .City, .Agent (sanitized), .Dir, .Name.
Default (empty): "gc-{{.City}}-{{.Agent}}".

Workspace.description: Workspace holds city-level metadata and optional defaults that apply to all agents unless overridden per-agent.
